 Used to initialize error checking or error correction depending on whether or not we're using FEC or CRC.

Detailed Description

This header provides some defines used for most cc1000 routing layers.

Driver requires: AVR architecture with cc1000 connected via SPI bus.

Author:
Brian Shucker
Date:
03/03/2004
